scenes.headline: Let your capital move intelligently.
scenes.body: Deposit once. Hyper Strategies automatically routes capital between vaults, safety funds, and upcoming initiatives — so your money is always working.

scenes.headline: The money flow.
scenes.body: On deposit, 80% enters active strategies and 20% routes to the Safety Fund, farming protocols, and our token seeding pool.

scenes.headline: Our strategies.
scenes.body: Two vaults today: the Core Strategy for balanced growth, and a High-Risk Strategy for amplified exposure on more volatile pairs.

scenes.headline: Inside a strategy.
scenes.body: Signals → positions → risk controls → rebalance → realize PnL → compound. Algorithmic trading with discretionary overlays and dynamic trailing stops.

scenes.headline: Security and sustainability.
scenes.body: A portion of deposits strengthens the Safety Fund and is deployed to farming protocols; the buy-back engine and token seeding align long-term incentives.

scenes.headline: Transparent performance.
scenes.body: Fees use a high-watermark model: 20% of profits after the watermark. Track results and understand variability over time.

scenes.headline: Community & Syndicates.
scenes.body: Earn through syndicate participation and transparent on-chain rewards. Share performance responsibly and grow together.

scenes.headline: Ready to start?
scenes.body: Connect your wallet and choose a vault. You can withdraw at any time, subject to venue conditions and market liquidity.

notes: We allocate 20% of deposits across Safety Fund, farming protocols, and token seeding.

strategies.name: Core Strategy
strategies.short: Flagship algorithmic strategy with discretionary overlays, trailing stops, and a focus on high-market-cap pairs.

strategies.name: High-Risk Strategy

protections.title: Safety Fund
protections.body: A portion of deposits accrues to a Safety Fund designed to buffer unexpected events.

protections.title: Farming Protocols
protections.body: Selective farming to diversify income streams and support sustainability.

protections.title: Buy-back Engine
protections.body: Directed revenue supports periodic buy-backs to align incentives with the ecosystem.

protections.title: Risk Controls
protections.body: Dynamic stop-losses, position sizing, and continuous monitoring aim to keep exposure within strict parameters.

tooltips.highWatermark: Fees only apply to new profits above the highest historical equity peak for your account.
tooltips.performanceFee: 20% of profits after high-watermark. No fee if there’s no new profit.
tooltips.depositSplit: 80% to active strategies. 20% across Safety Fund, farming protocols, and token seeding.
tooltips.trailingStop: Automatically adjusts stop-loss upward as a position moves in your favor.

faq.a: We route 20% of deposits to Safety Fund, farming protocols, and token seeding. We charge a 20% performance fee on profits above your high-watermark. No performance fee applies without new profits.

All strategies involve risk, including loss of capital. The Core Strategy targets moderate risk on high-market-cap pairs; the High-Risk Strategy intentionally accepts higher volatility and drawdowns.
